title: third_chapter_start
body:
The world has a disease, you aware of that of course
Undead roaring about the world, slowly destroying everything
But they couldn't conquer us, yet
That is why The Mable Alliance came along
Mable, Kerod, Niar, all weak as a town by itself
But together we can defend it.
Niar, once a great town, positive toward the alliance now looks the other way
They prefer to work alone and they think they can make it big without us all.
Go there, try to work it out.
[[stop]]

title: arbitrage
body:
Player: Keevan sent me
Mayor: For what cause?
He told me you want out of the alliance
It is true, that alliance won't last long
It will be better to break it up
Each town to itself
Perfecly balanced.
You, however seems like a fine man
I have a job for you, if it suits you
At Kerod, your town, go to the merchant and take from him an axe and bring it to me
[[stop]]

title: axe_em
body:
Hey mace
Great to see you
What news you bring for me?
The mayor of Niar asked me to supply him with an axe from you
Ah I know what he's after
Here[[stop]]

title: axe_em2
body:
Tell him I said hello
Will do
See you Mace.
[[stop]]

title: package_delivered
body:
Mace, Great to see you
I have your axe
Great
Listen
The Mable Alliance is not a good one
But I want to form another
Not one ruled by Keevan
And I see a bright future
The Niar Society
Join me and we will survive the upcoming war
What war?
My lookouts say hoards of undead
With a clear direction towards us
And their not too far, but will arrive eventually
I cannot join you for that
I must protect Mable
I understand
Perhaps another time then
See you later Mace.
[[stop]]
